about.heroTitle: More Than Fashion - We Create Connections
about.heroSubtitle: At StyleHub, we believe clothing is the ultimate form of self-expression
about.missionContent: Founded in {{year}}, we're on a journey to democratize style while maintaining ethical standards. We curate contemporary fashion that empowers individuals to showcase their unique personality while staying comfortable in their own skin.
about.storyContent1: What began as a small boutique idea between fashion-school friends has blossomed into a global community of style enthusiasts. Our founders - Alex, Taylor, and Sam - noticed a gap between runway trends and wearable everyday fashion.
about.storyContent2: Through careful curation and collaborations with emerging designers, we've created a platform that brings fresh perspectives to your wardrobe while maintaining accessibility and affordability.
about.qualityContent: Rigorous quality checks ensuring longevity of every garment
about.sizingContent: Styles available from XXS to 5XL because beauty has no size
about.sustainabilityContent: 65% of our collection uses eco-friendly materials
about.ctaContent: When you shop with us, you're not just buying clothes - you're supporting ethical manufacturing, emerging designers, and a community that celebrates individuality.
about.teamContent: Our diverse team of 200+ fashion experts, tech innovators, and customer care specialists work tirelessly to bring you a seamless shopping experience.
